            <div class="entry">
                <div class="entryContent">
                    <div class="column wideColumn feature ">
	<a href="/vehicle-care-guide">Get our Vehicle Care Guide mailed to you absolutely FREE!</a> <a href="/vehicle-care-guide"><img alt="Vehicle Car Guide" class="alignleft" src="/Files/Images/vehicle-car-guide.png" /></a>
	<p>
		According to an article by Margarette Burnette on Bankrate.com, skipping required vehicle maintenance could cost you an additional $7000! Keep that $7000 in your pocket by properly maintaining your vehicle. Learn how in our NEW Vehicle Care Guide (it's FREE!)</p>
</div>
<br />
<h2>
	William Michael Automotive – Auto Repair Santa Clara, San Jose and South Bay Cities.</h2>
<p>
	<iframe allowfullscreen="" class="alignright" frameborder="0" height="253" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/_fAtTSWyFas" width="450"></iframe></p>
<p>
	Here at William Michael Automotive we are passionate about automotive maintenance, diagnostics and repairs. We specialize in 1990 and newer Asian/Domestic cars and trucks and we are now a full service center for Audi, BMW, and Volkswagen.</p>
<p>
	William Michael Automotive is breaking the mold of public perception of the automotive repair industry. For more than twenty years, our technicians have delivered the highest level of auto repair in Santa Clara</p>
<p>
	Our proactive business philosophy keeps our customers' vehicles reliable and reduces the chance of unexpected break downs and expensive auto repairs. Let our ASE certified technicians examine your car or perform any routine maintenance that your automobile requires. Here you will discover honest answers for all of your questions and concerns and reliable services and repairs that keep your car performing at its best.</p>
<h4>
	Services Include:</h4>
<ul>
	<li>
		Engine Diagnostic and Repair</li>
	<li>
		Routine Maintenance</li>
	<li>
		A/C Repairs</li>
	<li>
		Tire Rotation</li>
	<li>
		<a href="/services">And a lot more!</a></li>
</ul>
<div class="clear">
	 </div>
<div class="column alignleft">
	<h2>
		National Warranty</h2>
	<img alt="Warranty National" class="alignleft" src="/Files/Images/warranty-18months.png" /> <span>We provide 18 months / 18,000 mile national warranty on mechanical repairs. </span></div>
<div class="column alignright">
	<h2>
		Courtesy shuttle</h2>
	<img alt="Courtesy shuttle" class="alignleft" src="/Files/Images/courtesy-shuttle.png" /> <span>We provide a FREE courtesy shuttle, inside city limits, to our customers for most services. If it looks like your repairs could take a while, don't forget to ask about it!</span></div>
<div class="column alignleft">
	<h2>
		Free Wi-Fi</h2>
	<img alt="Free Wi Fi" class="alignleft" src="/Files/Images/free-wi-fi.png" /> <span>For your convenience we are offering Free Wi-Fi in our waiting room, while repairs are been made!</span></div>
<div class="column alignright">
	<h2>
		Rental car available</h2>
	<img alt="Rental car available with car repair" class="alignleft" src="/Files/Images/freerentalcar.png" /> <span>We are able to provide discounts to our customers on rental cars. Rental cars available through Hertz at a reduced rate.</span></div>
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="aligncenter" style="width: 250px; background-color: white; color: black;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>

		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>
